from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from typing import List, Optional
from datetime import datetime
from enum import Enum


class PropertyType(str, Enum):
    APARTMENT = "apartment"
    HOUSE = "house"
    CONDO = "condo"
    VILLA = "villa"
    CABIN = "cabin"
    TOWNHOUSE = "townhouse"


class Amenity(str, Enum):
    WIFI = "wifi"
    KITCHEN = "kitchen"
    PARKING = "parking"
    POOL = "pool"
    GYM = "gym"
    AIR_CONDITIONING = "air_conditioning"
    HEATING = "heating"
    WASHER = "washer"
    DRYER = "dryer"
    TV = "tv"
    WORKSPACE = "workspace"
    PET_FRIENDLY = "pet_friendly"
    SMOKING_ALLOWED = "smoking_allowed"


class Location(BaseModel):
    address: str
    city: str
    state: str
    country: str
    zip_code: str
    latitude: float = Field(..., ge=-90, le=90)
    longitude: float = Field(..., ge=-180, le=180)


class Property(BaseModel):
    id: str
    title: str
    description: str
    property_type: PropertyType
    location: Location
    price_per_night: float = Field(..., gt=0)
    max_guests: int = Field(..., ge=1)
    bedrooms: int = Field(..., ge=0)
    bathrooms: float = Field(..., ge=0)
    amenities: List[Amenity]
    images: List[str]
    rating: float = Field(..., ge=0, le=5)
    review_count: int = Field(..., ge=0)
    host_id: str
    host_name: str
    host_avatar: Optional[str] = None
    is_superhost: bool = False
    instant_book: bool = False
    created_at: datetime
    updated_at: datetime

    class Config:
        json_encoders = {
            datetime: lambda v: v.isoformat()
        }


class PropertySummary(BaseModel):
    id: str
    title: str
    location: Location
    price_per_night: float
    rating: float
    review_count: int
    images: List[str]
    property_type: PropertyType
    max_guests: int
    bedrooms: int
    bathrooms: float
    instant_book: bool
    is_superhost: bool

from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from typing import Optional, List
from datetime import date
from .property import PropertyType, Amenity


class SearchQuery(BaseModel):
    location: Optional[str] = None
    check_in: Optional[date] = None
    check_out: Optional[date] = None
    guests: int = Field(default=1, ge=1)
    min_price: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0)
    max_price: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0)
    property_types: Optional[List[PropertyType]] = None
    amenities: Optional[List[Amenity]] = None
    min_rating: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0, le=5)
    instant_book: Optional[bool] = None
    superhost: Optional[bool] = None
    bedrooms: Optional[int] = Field(None, ge=0)
    bathrooms: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0)
    limit: int = Field(default=20, ge=1, le=100)
    offset: int = Field(default=0, ge=0)
    sort_by: str = Field(default="relevance", regex="^(relevance|price_low|price_high|rating|newest)$")
    map_bounds: Optional[dict] = None  # {"north": float, "south": float, "east": float, "west": float}

    class Config:
        json_encoders = {
            date: lambda v: v.isoformat()
        }


class SearchResponse(BaseModel):
    properties: List[dict]
    total_count: int
    has_more: bool
    search_params: SearchQuery
    suggestions: List[str] = []
    price_range: dict = {"min": 0, "max": 0}


class AutoCompleteSuggestion(BaseModel):
    id: str
    name: str
    type: str  # "city", "region", "country"
    country: str
    display_name: str
    latitude: float
    longitude: float


class AutoCompleteResponse(BaseModel):
    suggestions: List[AutoCompleteSuggestion]
    query: str

@router.get("/search", response_model=SearchResponse)
async def search_properties(
    location: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Location to search"),
    check_in: Optional[date] = Query(None, description="Check-in date"),
    check_out: Optional[date] = Query(None, description="Check-out date"),
    guests: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Number of guests"),
    min_price: Optional[float] = Query(None, ge=0, description="Minimum price per night"),
    max_price: Optional[float] = Query(None, ge=0, description="Maximum price per night"),
    property_types: Optional[List[str]] = Query(None, description="Property types to filter"),
    amenities: Optional[List[str]] = Query(None, description="Required amenities"),
    min_rating: Optional[float] = Query(None, ge=0, le=5, description="Minimum rating"),
    instant_book: Optional[bool] = Query(None, description="Instant book only"),
    superhost: Optional[bool] = Query(None, description="Superhost only"),
    bedrooms: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=0, description="Minimum bedrooms"),
    bathrooms: Optional[float] = Query(None, ge=0, description="Minimum bathrooms"),
    limit: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Number of results"),
    offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination"),
    sort_by: str = Query("relevance", regex="^(relevance|price_low|price_high|rating|newest)$")
):
    """Search for properties based on various criteria"""
    
    # Filter properties based on criteria
    filtered_properties = MOCK_PROPERTIES
    
    if location:
        location_lower = location.lower()
        filtered_properties = [
            p for p in filtered_properties
            if location_lower in p.location.city.lower() or
               location_lower in p.location.state.lower() or
               location_lower in p.location.country.lower()
        ]
    
    if min_price is not None:
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.price_per_night >= min_price]
    
    if max_price is not None:
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.price_per_night <= max_price]
    
    if property_types:
        types = [PropertyType(t) for t in property_types]
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.property_type in types]
    
    if amenities:
        required_amenities = [Amenity(a) for a in amenities]
        filtered_properties = [
            p for p in filtered_properties
            if all(amenity in p.amenities for amenity in required_amenities)
        ]
    
    if min_rating is not None:
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.rating >= min_rating]
    
    if instant_book is not None:
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.instant_book == instant_book]
    
    if superhost is not None:
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.is_superhost == superhost]
    
    if bedrooms is not None:
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.bedrooms >= bedrooms]
    
    if bathrooms is not None:
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.bathrooms >= bathrooms]
    
    # Sort results
    if sort_by == "price_low":
        filtered_properties.sort(key=lambda x: x.price_per_night)
    elif sort_by == "price_high":
        filtered_properties.sort(key=lambda x: x.price_per_night, reverse=True)
    elif sort_by == "rating":
        filtered_properties.sort(key=lambda x: x.rating, reverse=True)
    elif sort_by == "newest":
        filtered_properties.sort(key=lambda x: x.created_at, reverse=True)
    
    # Calculate price range
    prices = [p.price_per_night for p in filtered_properties]
    price_range = {
        "min": min(prices) if prices else 0,
        "max": max(prices) if prices else 0
    }
    
    # Pagination
    total_count = len(filtered_properties)
    paginated_properties = filtered_properties[offset:offset + limit]
    
    # Convert to dict for response
    properties_dict = [p.dict() for p in paginated_properties]
    
    return SearchResponse(
        properties=properties_dict,
        total_count=total_count,
        has_more=offset + limit < total_count,
        search_params=SearchQuery(
            location=location,
            check_in=check_in,
            check_out=check_out,
            guests=guests,
            min_price=min_price,
            max_price=max_price,
            property_types=property_types,
            amenities=amenities,
            min_rating=min_rating,
            instant_book=instant_book,
            superhost=superhost,
            bedrooms=bedrooms,
            bathrooms=bathrooms,
            limit=limit,
            offset=offset,
            sort_by=sort_by
        ),
        price_range=price_range
    )


@router.get("/autocomplete", response_model=AutoCompleteResponse)
async def autocomplete_location(
    query: str = Query(..., min_length=1, description="Search query for location")
):
    """Get location autocomplete suggestions"""
    
    # Mock autocomplete data
    suggestions = []

                name=city,
                type="city",
                country=country,
                display_name=f"{city}, {state}",
                latitude=lat,
                longitude=lng
            ))
    
    return AutoCompleteResponse(
        suggestions=suggestions[:5],  # Limit to 5 suggestions
        query=query
    )


@router.get("/{property_id}", response_model=Property)
async def get_property(property_id: str):
    """Get a specific property by ID"""
    
    for property in MOCK_PROPERTIES:
        if property.id == property_id:
            return property

import axios from 'axios';
import type {
  Property,
  SearchQuery,
  SearchResponse,
  AutoCompleteResponse,
  AutoCompleteSuggestion
} from '@/types/property';

const API_URL = import.meta.env.VITE_API_URL || 'http://localhost:8000/api';

const api = axios.create({
  baseURL: API_URL,
  headers: {
    'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  },
});

export const propertyService = {
  async searchProperties(query: SearchQuery): Promise<SearchResponse> {
    const params = new URLSearchParams();
    
    if (query.location) params.append('location', query.location);
    if (query.check_in) params.append('check_in', query.check_in);
    if (query.check_out) params.append('check_out', query.check_out);
    if (query.guests) params.append('guests', query.guests.toString());
    if (query.min_price) params.append('min_price', query.min_price.toString());
    if (query.max_price) params.append('max_price', query.max_price.toString());
    if (query.min_rating) params.append('min_rating', query.min_rating.toString());
    if (query.instant_book !== undefined) params.append('instant_book', query.instant_book.toString());
    if (query.superhost !== undefined) params.append('superhost', query.superhost.toString());
    if (query.bedrooms) params.append('bedrooms', query.bedrooms.toString());
    if (query.bathrooms) params.append('bathrooms', query.bathrooms.toString());
    if (query.limit) params.append('limit', query.limit.toString());
    if (query.offset) params.append('offset', query.offset.toString());
    if (query.sort_by) params.append('sort_by', query.sort_by);
    
    if (query.property_types) {
      query.property_types.forEach(type => params.append('property_types', type));
    }
    
    if (query.amenities) {
      query.amenities.forEach(amenity => params.append('amenities', amenity));
    }

    const response = await api.get<SearchResponse>('/properties/search', { params });
    return response.data;
  },

  async getProperty(id: string): Promise<Property> {
    const response = await api.get<Property>(`/properties/${id}`);
    return response.data;
  },

  async getLocationSuggestions(query: string): Promise<AutoCompleteSuggestion[]> {
    const response = await api.get<AutoCompleteResponse>('/properties/autocomplete', {
      params: { query }
    });
    return response.data.suggestions;
  },

  async getPopularDestinations(): Promise<AutoCompleteSuggestion[]> {
    const popularCities = [
      {
        id: 'los_angeles_california',

export interface DateRange {
  start: Date | undefined;
  end: Date | undefined;
}

export const formatDate = (date: Date): string => {
  return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', {
    month: 'short',
    day: 'numeric',
    year: 'numeric'
  });
};

export const formatDateRange = (range: DateRange): string => {
  if (!range.start) return 'Add dates';
  if (!range.end) return formatDate(range.start);
  
  const start = formatDate(range.start);
  const end = formatDate(range.end);
  
  return `${start} - ${end}`;
};

export const formatDateForAPI = (date: Date): string => {
  return date.toISOString().split('T')[0];
};

export const isValidDateRange = (range: DateRange): boolean => {
  return !!(range.start && range.end && range.start <= range.end);
};

export const getDaysBetween = (start: Date, end: Date): number => {
  const oneDay = 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000;
  const diffTime = Math.abs(end.getTime() - start.getTime());
  return Math.ceil(diffTime / oneDay);
};

export const addDays = (date: Date, days: number): Date => {
  const result = new Date(date);
  result.setDate(result.getDate() + days);
  return result;
};

export const isDateAvailable = (date: Date, bookedDates: Date[]): boolean => {
  return !bookedDates.some(bookedDate => 
    bookedDate.toDateString() === date.toDateString()
  );
};

export const getMonthName = (date: Date): string => {
  return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'long', year: 'numeric' });
};

export const getNextMonth = (date: Date): Date => {
  const nextMonth = new Date(date);
  nextMonth.setMonth(nextMonth.getMonth() + 1);
  return nextMonth;
};

export const getPreviousMonth = (date: Date): Date => {
  const prevMonth = new Date(date);
  prevMonth.setMonth(prevMonth.getMonth() - 1);
  return prevMonth;
};

export const isSameDay = (date1: Date, date2: Date): boolean => {
  return date1.toDateString() === date2.toDateString();
};

export const isBefore = (date1: Date, date2: Date): boolean => {
  return date1 < date2;
};

export const isAfter = (date1: Date, date2: Date): boolean => {
  return date1 > date2;
};

export const getToday = (): Date => {
  const today = new Date();
  today.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);
  return today;
};

export const getTomorrow = (): Date => {
  return addDays(getToday(), 1);
};

export const parseDateString = (dateString: string): Date | null => {
  const date = new Date(dateString);
  return isNaN(date.getTime()) ? null : date;
};

export const getDefaultDateRange = (): DateRange => {
  const today = getToday();
  const tomorrow = getTomorrow();
  
  return {
    start: today,
    end: tomorrow
  };
};

export const validateDateRange = (range: DateRange): { valid: boolean; error?: string } => {
  if (!range.start) {
    return { valid: false, error: 'Please select a check-in date' };
  }
  
  if (!range.end) {
    return { valid: false, error: 'Please select a check-out date' };
  }
  
  if (range.start < getToday()) {
    return { valid: false, error: 'Check-in date cannot be in the past' };
  }
  
  if (range.end <= range.start) {
    return { valid: false, error: 'Check-out date must be after check-in date' };
  }
  
  return { valid: true };
};

export const formatForDisplay = (date: Date): string => {
  const today = getToday();
  const tomorrow = getTomorrow();
  
  if (isSameDay(date, today)) return 'Today';
  if (isSameDay(date, tomorrow)) return 'Tomorrow';
  
  return formatDate(date);
};
</action>

```
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from typing import List, Optional
from datetime import datetime
from enum import Enum


class PropertyType(str, Enum):
    APARTMENT = "apartment"
    HOUSE = "house"
    CONDO = "condo"
    VILLA = "villa"
    CABIN = "cabin"
    TOWNHOUSE = "townhouse"


class Amenity(str, Enum):
    WIFI = "wifi"
    KITCHEN = "kitchen"
    PARKING = "parking"
    POOL = "pool"
    GYM = "gym"
    AIR_CONDITIONING = "air_conditioning"
    HEATING = "heating"
    WASHER = "washer"
    DRYER = "dryer"
    TV = "tv"
    WORKSPACE = "workspace"
    PET_FRIENDLY = "pet_friendly"
    SMOKING_ALLOWED = "smoking_allowed"


class Location(BaseModel):
    address: str
    city: str
    state: str
    country: str
    zip_code: str
    latitude: float = Field(..., ge=-90, le=90)
    longitude: float = Field(..., ge=-180, le=180)


class Property(BaseModel):
    id: str
    title: str
    description: str
    property_type: PropertyType
    location: Location
    price_per_night: float = Field(..., gt=0)
    max_guests: int = Field(..., ge=1)
    bedrooms: int = Field(..., ge=0)
    bathrooms: float = Field(..., ge=0)
    amenities: List[Amenity]
    images: List[str]
    rating: float = Field(..., ge=0, le=5)
    review_count: int = Field(..., ge=0)
    host_id: str
    host_name: str
    host_avatar: Optional[str] = None
    is_superhost: bool = False
    instant_book: bool = False
    created_at: datetime
    updated_at: datetime

    class Config:
        json_encoders = {
            datetime: lambda v: v.isoformat()
        }


class PropertySummary(BaseModel):
    id: str
    title: str
    location: Location
    price_per_night: float
    rating: float
    review_count: int
    images: List[str]
    property_type: PropertyType
    max_guests: int
    bedrooms: int
    bathrooms: float
    instant_book: bool
    is_superhost: bool
```

```
@router.get("/search", response_model=SearchResponse)
async def search_properties(
    location: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Location to search"),
    check_in: Optional[date] = Query(None, description="Check-in date"),
    check_out: Optional[date] = Query(None, description="Check-out date"),
    guests: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Number of guests"),
    min_price: Optional[float] = Query(None, ge=0, description="Minimum price per night"),
    max_price: Optional[float] = Query(None, ge=0, description="Maximum price per night"),
    property_types: Optional[List[str]] = Query(None, description="Property types to filter"),
    amenities: Optional[List[str]] = Query(None, description="Required amenities"),
    min_rating: Optional[float] = Query(None, ge=0, le=5, description="Minimum rating"),
    instant_book: Optional[bool] = Query(None, description="Instant book only"),
    superhost: Optional[bool] = Query(None, description="Superhost only"),
    bedrooms: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=0, description="Minimum bedrooms"),
    bathrooms: Optional[float] = Query(None, ge=0, description="Minimum bathrooms"),
    limit: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Number of results"),
    offset: int = Query(0, ge=0, description="Offset for pagination"),
    sort_by: str = Query("relevance", regex="^(relevance|price_low|price_high|rating|newest)$")
):
    """Search for properties based on various criteria"""
    
    # Filter properties based on criteria
    filtered_properties = MOCK_PROPERTIES
    
    if location:
        location_lower = location.lower()
        filtered_properties = [
            p for p in filtered_properties
            if location_lower in p.location.city.lower() or
               location_lower in p.location.state.lower() or
               location_lower in p.location.country.lower()
        ]
    
    if min_price is not None:
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.price_per_night >= min_price]
    
    if max_price is not None:
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.price_per_night <= max_price]
    
    if property_types:
        types = [PropertyType(t) for t in property_types]
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.property_type in types]
    
    if amenities:
        required_amenities = [Amenity(a) for a in amenities]
        filtered_properties = [
            p for p in filtered_properties
            if all(amenity in p.amenities for amenity in required_amenities)
        ]
    
    if min_rating is not None:
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.rating >= min_rating]
    
    if instant_book is not None:
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.instant_book == instant_book]
    
    if superhost is not None:
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.is_superhost == superhost]
    
    if bedrooms is not None:
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.bedrooms >= bedrooms]
    
    if bathrooms is not None:
        filtered_properties = [p for p in filtered_properties if p.bathrooms >= bathrooms]
    
    # Sort results
    if sort_by == "price_low":
        filtered_properties.sort(key=lambda x: x.price_per_night)
    elif sort_by == "price_high":
        filtered_properties.sort(key=lambda x: x.price_per_night, reverse=True)
    elif sort_by == "rating":
        filtered_properties.sort(key=lambda x: x.rating, reverse=True)
    elif sort_by == "newest":
        filtered_properties.sort(key=lambda x: x.created_at, reverse=True)
    
    # Calculate price range
    prices = [p.price_per_night for p in filtered_properties]
    price_range = {
        "min": min(prices) if prices else 0,
        "max": max(prices) if prices else 0
    }
    
    # Pagination
    total_count = len(filtered_properties)
    paginated_properties = filtered_properties[offset:offset + limit]
    
    # Convert to dict for response
    properties_dict = [p.dict() for p in paginated_properties]
    
    return SearchResponse(
        properties=properties_dict,
        total_count=total_count,
        has_more=offset + limit < total_count,
        search_params=SearchQuery(
            location=location,
            check_in=check_in,
            check_out=check_out,
            guests=guests,
            min_price=min_price,
            max_price=max_price,
            property_types=property_types,
            amenities=amenities,
            min_rating=min_rating,
            instant_book=instant_book,
            superhost=superhost,
            bedrooms=bedrooms,
            bathrooms=bathrooms,
            limit=limit,
            offset=offset,
            sort_by=sort_by
        ),
        price_range=price_range
    )

                type="city",
                country=country,
                display_name=f"{city}, {state}",
                latitude=lat,
                longitude=lng
            ))
    
    return AutoCompleteResponse(
        suggestions=suggestions[:5],  # Limit to 5 suggestions
        query=query
    )


@router.get("/{property_id}", response_model=Property)
async def get_property(property_id: str):
    """Get a specific property by ID"""
    
    for property in MOCK_PROPERTIES:
        if property.id == property_id:
            return property
    
    raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Property not found")
```
